Enums/PythiaError.html#/c:@M@VirgilCrypt.name: errorBadArguments
Enums/PythiaError.html#/c:@M@VirgilCrypt.abstract: This error should not be returned if assertions is enabled.

Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.name: configure()
Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.abstract: Performs global initialization of the pythia library.

Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.name: cleanup()
Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.abstract: Performs global cleanup of the pythia library.

Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.name: blindedPasswordBufLen()
Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.abstract: Return length of the buffer needed to hold ‘blinded password’.

Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.name: deblindedPasswordBufLen()
Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.abstract: Return length of the buffer needed to hold ‘deblinded password’.

Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.name: blindingSecretBufLen()
Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.abstract: Return length of the buffer needed to hold ‘blinding secret’.

Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.name: transformationPrivateKeyBufLen()
Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.abstract: Return length of the buffer needed to hold ‘transformation private key’.

Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.name: transformationPublicKeyBufLen()
Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.abstract: Return length of the buffer needed to hold ‘transformation public key’.

Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.name: transformedPasswordBufLen()
Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.abstract: Return length of the buffer needed to hold ‘transformed password’.

Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.name: transformedTweakBufLen()
Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.abstract: Return length of the buffer needed to hold ‘transformed tweak’.

Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.name: proofValueBufLen()
Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.abstract: Return length of the buffer needed to hold ‘proof value’.

Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.name: passwordUpdateTokenBufLen()
Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.abstract: Return length of the buffer needed to hold ‘password update token’.

Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.name: blind(password:)
Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.abstract: Blinds password. Turns password into a pseudo-random string.

Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.name: deblind(transformedPassword:blindingSecret:)
Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.abstract: Deblinds ‘transformed password’ value with previously returned ‘blinding secret’ from blind().

Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.name: transform(blindedPassword:tweak:transformationPrivateKey:)
Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.abstract: Transforms blinded password using transformation private key.

Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.name: prove(transformedPassword:blindedPassword:transformedTweak:transformationPrivateKey:transformationPublicKey:)
Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.abstract: Generates proof that server possesses secret values that were used to transform password.

Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.name: verify(transformedPassword:blindedPassword:tweak:transformationPublicKey:proofValueC:proofValueU:)
Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.abstract: This operation allows client to verify that the output of transform() is correct,

Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.name: getPasswordUpdateToken(previousTransformationPrivateKey:newTransformationPrivateKey:)
Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.abstract: Rotates old transformation key to new transformation key and generates ‘password update token’,

Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.name: updateDeblindedWithToken(deblindedPassword:passwordUpdateToken:)
Classes/Pythia.html#/c:@M@VirgilCryptoPy.abstract: Updates previously stored ‘deblinded password’ with ‘password update token’.

Classes/Pythia.html.name: Pythia
Classes/Pythia.html.abstract: Provide Pythia implementation based on the Virgil Security.
